predicate.note: Frames file for 'disgruntle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1.

example.name: usually adjectival
example.text: It reduces lawsuits from disgruntled employees and ex-employees, with all that means for reduced legal costs and better public relations.
example.note: The treebanking presumes that only the current employees are disgruntled; presumably the ex-employees have been regruntled.
